meanings.definition: A member of a police force wearing a blue uniform.
meanings.sent1: The bluecoats patrolled the streets to keep everyone safe.
meanings.sent2: The bluecoats helped direct traffic during the busy event.
meanings.sent3: The bluecoats stopped to help a lost kitten find its way home.
meanings.sent4: The bluecoats stood out like bright stars in the dark night.
meanings.sent5: Children waved excitedly at the passing bluecoats in uniform.

meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of bluecoats to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent3: The bluecoats in the garden seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The bluecoats danced gracefully in the sunlight, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The bluecoats added a touch of serenity to the landscape with their vibrant color.

meanings.definition: A type of military uniform worn by soldiers in the past.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers proudly wore their bluecoats into battle.
meanings.sent2: The bluecoats of the past were heavy but provided good protection.
meanings.sent3: The bluecoats of old must have felt quite warm in the summer sun.
meanings.sent4: The bluecoats symbolized bravery and loyalty on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The bluecoats gleamed in the sunlight, a reminder of the soldiers' valor.
